name: The Exploits of Jimothy Jones
description:
Experience the thrilling exploits of Jimothy Jones, as told to his grandson Timmy. Made for the GDL August Jam (2020).

This is a Gameboy Color game, made in GB Studio. Playable in the web emulator and rom can be downloaded and played too!

Credits:

Music from the GB Studio Community Assets: https://github.com/DeerTears/GB-Studio-Community-Assets
